response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This extraordinary item holds immense value to us, but we believe it would be an unparalleled asset to you. Considering its worth, we propose a special offer of $950,000 for this product. We are confident that this price reflects its true value while offering you an exceptional opportunity to acquire something truly remarkable. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of a seamless transaction and unparalleled customer service. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 950000}
